summary: Just some personal edits of some NPC's.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Verdana][u][b]Made for my own fun again.[/b][/u]

[size=2]This simple edit mainly changes armour and items of some NPC's.[/size]

[u]It edits and replaces:[/u][/font]
[size=3]
[/size][font=Verdana][size=3][b]Aela The Huntress - [/b]Wolf Armor No Helmet
[/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=3][b]Athis - [/b]Wolf Armor Full
[/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=3][b]Farkas - [/b]Wolf Armor No Helmet
[/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=3][b]Njada Stonearm - [/b]Wolf Armor Full
[/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=3][b]Ria - [/b]Wolf Armor No Helmet
[/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=3][b]Torvar - [/b]Wolf Armor No Helmet
[/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=3][b]Vignar Gray-Mane - [/b]Fine Clothes 2 With Gloves, Imperial Sword
[/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=3][b]Vilkas - [/b]Wolf Armor No Helmet
[/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=3][b]Irileth - [/b]Whiterun Guard Outfit No Helmet, Elven Sword Shock 5, Elven Bow, Elven Arrows
[/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=3][b]Farengar Secret-Fire - [/b]Master Illusion, Staff Chain Lightning
[/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=3][b]Jenassa - [/b]Scaled Armor No Helmet, Glass Sword, Glass Bow & Arrows
[/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=3][b]Eorlund Gray-Mane - [/b]Blacksmith Outfit 2, Skyforge Steel Greatsword
[/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=3][b]Uthgerd the Unbroken - [/b]Draugr Armor No Helmet, Nord Hero Greatsword, Class Change Warrior 2H
[/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=3][b]Brelyna Maryon - [/b]Expert Destruction Robes, Staff Chain Lightning, Book Change
[/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=3][b]Ugor - [/b]Orcish Armor No Helmet, Orcish Shield, Orcish Sword, Orcish Bow, Orcish Arrow
[/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=3][b]Borgakh - [/b]Orcish Armor Full
[/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=3][b]Ghorbash the Iron Hand - [/b]Orcish Armor No Helmet, Orcish War Axe
[/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=3][b]Chief Burguk - [/b]Orcish Armor Full
[/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=3][b]Nirya - [/b]Master Alteration Robes
[/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=3][b]Mjoll the Lioness - [/b]Steel Plate No Helmet
[/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=3][b]Brother Verulus - [/b]Monk Outfit No Hood, Staff Mass Charm
[/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=3][b]Ysolda[/b][b] - [/b]Merchant Clothes 2 No Hat, Dwarven Dagger
[/size][/font]
[center][b][u][i]This list is of the current Version.[/i][/u][/b][/center][font=Verdana]
If you have got other mods that change these NPC's it most likely won't work or It may just break some things sorry if that is the case.
[/font][center][font=Verdana]
[/font][u][b][font=Verdana]Install is like any other mod can add through a ModÂ Organiser or manually.[/font][/b]
[/u][/center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
You may like this or not does not really matter that much.
author: Frogthechef
